H0.text: Who is the only Scotsman to have been European Footballer of the Year (now called the Ballon d'Or). Kenny Dalglish

H1.text: Who is the only Scotsman to have been European Footballer of the Year (now called the Ballon d'Or). Paul McStay

H2.text: Who is the only Scotsman to have been European Footballer of the Year (now called the Ballon d'Or). Jimmy Johnstone

H3.text: Who is the only Scotsman to have been European Footballer of the Year (now called the Ballon d'Or). Denis Law

A4.text: Dalglish won the Ballon d'Or Silver Award in 1983.
